1370: Katerina moved to Cromme straet.D.7 after marriage.
Got married to Lotijn at age 17 in 1370.
1371: Gave birth to Meynolphus in 1371 at age 18.
1372: Gave birth to Lambrecht in 1372 at age 19.
1375: Gave birth to Meynseth in 1375 at age 22.
1382: Gave birth to Berta in 1382 at age 29.
1383: Gave birth to Saswe in 1383 at age 30.
1385: Gave birth to Reymodis in 1385 at age 32.
1387: Lost daughter Saswe when Saswe was 5 years old.
1390: Gave birth to Radulphus in 1390 at age 37.
1392: Gave birth to Marisseis in 1392 at age 39.
1393: Lost daughter Marisseis when Marisseis was 2 years old.
1394: Gave birth to Bollarde in 1394 at age 41.
1398: Lost daughter Meynseth when Meynseth was 23 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
